title: The Writer's Almanac for Sunday, May 1, 2022
description: On this date in 1840, the first official adhesive postage stamp was issued in Great Britain. Called the Penny Black, it was an engraved profile of Queen Victoria on a black background.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this date in 1840, the first official adhesive postage stamp was issued in Great Britain. Called the Penny Black, it was an engraved profile of Queen Victoria on a black background.
